title: Episode 49: Classroom Management - An Interview with Dr. Ross Green part 2
description: In this episode I continue the interview on Collaborative Problem Solving in the classroom with Dr. Ross Green, author of The Explosive Child.  As I stated in the previous episode, there are a variety of classroom management techniques, all designed to help solve the issue of how to discipline children who are having behavioral problems.  I think you'll find that Dr. Green's approach makes a lot of sense and it can be implemented in the classroom as well as at home.  A fascinating interview.
